      • stripProtocolsStr

        public static java.lang.String stripProtocolsStr(java.net.URL url)
                                          throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        The following may be a hack: bundleLocationURL should have the form

        protocol:// ...

        but sometimes it seems to have two protocols:

        resource:file:/path/to/somewhere

        By applying the 'getPath' method to the URL twice, we obtain the plain path we are looking for.

        Parameters:
        url -
        Returns:
        a string with just the path
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException
